section.name: System
section.description: These are default system settings. Please do not change.

setting.name: System Name
setting.description: The package/system name (all lower case in the case of package names)

setting.name: Version
setting.description: The current version of this system. This is automatically version stamped from the build script.

setting.name: Live Project
setting.description: Indicate if this is a live project or not. If set to True, this data set is tied to a project.

setting.name: Project Creation Date
setting.description: The date this project was created.

setting.name: Project Edit Date
setting.description: The last time this project configuration file set was saved.

setting.name: Debugging
setting.description: If set to true, all events will be recorded to the log file for the purpose of debugging errors.

setting.name: User Name
setting.description: The name of the person using this system.

setting.name: About Text
setting.description: The description text that will show in the wiki about file.
setting.default: XeTeX-TIPE is a Scripture publishing management system written by the friendly developers at Payap University's Linguistics Institute (Text Unit). TIPE stands for TeX Intitated Publishing Envionment. It is currently being deployed in MSEAG and is under heavy development. Anyone wanting to try this system should be warned that it may not work in their context. However, the underlying principals of the system should work in any long document publishing environment. Therefore the package should be evaluated with that in mind. We welcome input and participation in this project. It is our hope it will be able to serve more than just MSEAG. For questions or more information please write: dennis_drescher@sil.org.

setting.name: Interface Language
setting.description: The language used to interface with the user.

setting.name: Log File Length
setting.description: This is the maximum number of lines that will be permited to be in the log file. This is necessary because TIPE records all events in one log file.

setting.name: Makefile Start Parameters
setting.description: Add extra parameters to the makefile call. This is useful for debugging. Be sure to leave the default command in place or nothing will work.

section.name: System File Names
section.description: This section contains the names of all the files used in the TIPE system.

setting.name: Log File Name
setting.description: The name of the project log file.

setting.name: Error Log File Name
setting.description: The name of the project error log file where errors are collected from a single session.

setting.name: Project File Name
setting.description: The name of the project configuration file.

setting.name: Source File Name
setting.description: The name of the project source file which points to all the sources of all project components.

setting.name: MAKEFILE NAME
setting.description: The name of the makefile file that will be run. Normally that would be '.makefile' but for various reasons it may need to be changed.

section.name: System Folder Names
section.description: This section contains the names of all the folders used in the TIPE system.

setting.name: Text Folder Name
setting.description: The name of the folder that the working text is stored in.

setting.name: Process Folder Name
setting.description: The name of the folder that the processes are run.

setting.name: Report Folder Name
setting.description: The name of the folder that reports are kept.

section.name: Known Languages
section.description: Languages known by the program interface.

setting.name: English
setting.description: English language

section.name: Book
section.description: The book is container for all the project components. The settings in thei section describe the book object.

setting.name: Book Type
setting.description: The type of publication this will be.

setting.name: Binding Order
setting.description: The order that the project components will be in.

section.name: Format
section.description: Settings having to do with the formating of this publication.

setting.name: Page Width
setting.description: The trimmed width of the page.

setting.name: Page Height
setting.description: The trimmed height of the page.

setting.name: Component ID
setting.description: The system identifier (ID) for this component.

setting.name: Component Type
setting.description: The name of the style file for this component.

setting.name: Component File Name
setting.description: The name of this component file.

setting.name: Style File Name
setting.description: The name of the style file for this component.

setting.name: TeX File Name
setting.description: The name of the TeX file for this component.
